body.content:
Dear friend,

I am an Australian citizen living in the USA and a realtor with 35 years of
experience. I recently became infected with the Covid-19 virus and due to
my age, I don't think I can survive this. I have been under oxygen for a
few days and I can't buy my life with money. I could donate 55million
USD to charity,
especially to help the poor. Last year I lost my wife to cancer and my
only son is a chronic
gambler who squandered all the funds I gave to him.
Lying in my sick bed, with no hope of survival, I wish
you helped me fulfill my last wish. This is a wish that will serve me
as a plea to God for my soul and my forgiveness of sins. If you are willing
and ready to help, please answer me and I will give you details. I know I
can trust you. Help me please.

Kind regards.

Shawn Hayden.
